name: 10 PM Saturday
effect:
Tactics 2 Turn 2 Speed 2

Challenge
Discard any other Challenge cards in play.
10 PM Saturday remains in play. While 10 PM Saturday is in play, all maneuvers with a Power or Traction requirement over 6 gain the text "This maneuver remains in play. While this maneuver is in play, you gain +1 Style."

name: 360 Degree Spin
effect:
Tactics 5 Turn 5 Speed 5

360 Degree Spin remains in play. While 360 Degree Spin is in play, you gain +2 Style. If your opponent does not counter 360 Degree Spin, they get 1 fewer card at the beginning of each stage while 360 Degree Spin is in play

name: 4WD Drift
effect:
Tactics 4 Turn 7 Speed 7

4WD cars only

You may only play 5...4...3...2...1 in the first stage of the race

Passenger
-1 Power (minimum 1).

Stage 2: Straight

Team

Engine

Ry and K.T. only
